content:
advertisement

Two days before the opening of Mezzanine  the newly named and remodeled Cell Block  the downtown hotspot was buzzing like the North Pole on Christmas Eve PERIOD

Dozens of workers swarmed around the building trying to get ready for todays opening by swinging ladders wiping windows working on intricate wiring and revving buzzsaws PERIOD Dust fell like a gentle snow over the clubs black couches and furniture PERIOD

And Lance Falkowski the general manager of Mezzanine  E PERIOD College Ave. knows every single worker PERIOD

 Falkowski said PERIOD 

Falkowski is presiding over a complete rehaul and remodeling of the bar PERIOD These changes aim to give the club more of a nightclub atmosphere further removing the industrial look of Cell Block and its past incarnation  the Crowbar Falkowski said PERIOD

The renovations include an addition of a DJ platform in the middle of the club improvements to the VIP section remodeled VIP bathrooms new decorations and new lasers for live shows and DJ sets PERIOD

Falkwoski hopes the new DJ platform  which includes big screen TVs on two sides  will create a strong tie between the audience and the DJ and help push forward the new vibe of the club PERIOD

 Falkowski said PERIOD 

But perhaps the most noticeable change is the name of the club itself PERIOD

 Falkowski said PERIOD

The name refers to the bars multiple levels he said PERIOD But even with the change in atmosphere and intended vibe Falkowski said the club will continue to hold true to its support of live acts PERIOD

Mainstays like Metal Mondays will continue and the club even plans to add a new night  Alternative Night  which is being developed for Sunday nights in the future Falkowski said PERIOD

Matt Price one of the organizers of Metal Mondays said he appreciates the mainstays and believes Mezzanine is one of the most progressive establishments in State College PERIOD

 Price said PERIOD 

Price said the club will only grow stronger from the renovation and new moniker PERIOD

 Price said PERIOD
